title: Sam Smith (actor)
text: Sam Smith (born 9 August 1989) is an <a href="England">English</a> former child actor. He played the title role in the 1999 <a href="ITV%20%28TV%20channel%29">ITV</a> series "<a href="Oliver%20Twist%20%281999%20miniseries%29">Oliver Twist</a>" and played David Wiseman in the 2003 film "<a href="Wondrous%20Oblivion">Wondrous Oblivion</a>".
